targets.query:
from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: -1m, stop: now())  // 최근 1분 데이터를 조회
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["_measurement"], set: ["machine_status", "machine_data", "machine_data1", "machine_data2", "machine_data3", "machine_data4", "machine_data5", "machine_data6", "machine_data7", "machine_data8", "machine_data9", "machine_data10", "machine_data11"]))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "machine_status" }))  // 모든 measurement를 "machine_status"로 묶음
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "device_name", "status"])  // 필드 관련 정보 제거
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: count, createEmpty: false)  // 1초 단위 메시지 수 계산
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])  // 시간별 그룹화
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)  // 시간 순으로 정렬
  |> yield(name: "total_count_per_second")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: -60m, stop: now())  // 최근 5분 데이터를 조회
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "machine_status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: count, createEmpty: false)  // 1초 단위 메시지 수 계산
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)  // 데이터 수가 많은 순으로 정렬
  |> yield(name: "sorted_count")

from(bucket: "system_metrics")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r._field == "usage_idle" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with host: "CPU" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])

from(bucket: "system_metrics")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and r._field == "used_percent")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with host: "Memory" }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "system_metrics")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and r._field == "available")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with host: "Memory" }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

used_percent = from(bucket: "system_metrics")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.path }))
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "Disk Usage (%)" })  // "used_percent"를 "Disk Usage (%)"로 변경

total_capacity = from(bucket: "system_metrics")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "total")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.path, _value: float(v: r._value) / (1024.0 * 1024.0 * 1024.0) }))
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "Total Disk Capacity (GB)" })  // "total_capacity"를 "Total Disk Capacity (GB)"로 변경

join(
    tables: {used_percent: used_percent, total_capacity: total_capacity},
    on: ["_time", "display_name"]
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "display_name", "Disk Usage (%)", "Total Disk Capacity (GB)"])  // 변경된 필드 이름 유지

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensor_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity" or r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])  // 시간 태그 제거
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: count, createEmpty: false)  // 메시지 수 계산
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "mybucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "machine_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "FEEDER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_sv" or r["_field"] == "speed_pv")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "mybucket")

  |> yield(name: "mean")
